trans-unit.source: Contains the metadata for a discoverable service.
trans-unit.target: 包含可发现服务的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The EndpointDiscoveryMetadata class contains metadata about the service it represents.
trans-unit.target: EndpointDiscoveryMetadata 类包含有关它表示的服务的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the endpoint address for the endpoint the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref> instance describes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置终结点的终结点地址<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref>实例描述。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint address for the service endpoint the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref> instance describes.
trans-unit.target: 服务终结点的终结点地址<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref>实例描述。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of contract type names implemented by the service described by the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取所描述该服务实现的协定类型名称的集合<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A collection of contract type names.
Gets the extensions associated with this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此关联的扩展<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: A collection of extensions.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref> from a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>.
A service endpoint.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref> instance.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref> class using the specified service endpoint and endpoint dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref>类使用的指定的服务终结点和终结点调度程序。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint.
The endpoint dispatcher.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref> instance.
Gets the listen URIs for the service described by this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此描述的服务获取的侦听 Uri <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"> </xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: A collection of listen URIs.
Gets the scopes associated with this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此关联的作用域<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: A collection of absolute URIs.
Gets or sets the version of the published <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所发布的版本<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The version of the published <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata"></xref>.
